survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Home Cleaning Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding subscription-based home cleaning services, including frequency, pricing, and service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you currently use a professional home cleaning service?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment respondents based on current usage frequency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you currently use a professional home cleaning service?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a home cleaning service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: This question identifies key decision-making factors for potential subscribers.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection with a limit of 3 selections.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a home cleaning service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is the maximum amount you would be willing to pay per month for a subscription-based home cleaning service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Bi-weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: This question gauges price sensitivity among current users.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: What is the maximum amount you would be willing to pay per month for a subscription-based home cleaning service?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Bi-weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1

questions.question_text: What would motivate you to subscribe to a home cleaning service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question helps identify barriers to adoption for non-users.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What would motivate you to subscribe to a home cleaning service?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Never' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home cleaning service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Bi-weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home cleaning service?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Weekly', 'Bi-weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Quarterly' to Q1
